text: The 1934–35 Drexel Dragons men's basketball team represented Drexel Institute of Art, Science and Industry during the 1934–35 men's basketball season. The Dragons, led by 3rd year head coach Ernest Lange, played their home games at Curtis Hall Gym and were members of the Eastern Pennsylvania Collegiate Basketball League (EPCBL). ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=9 style="background:#F8B800; color:#002663;"| Regular season |- ==References== Category:Drexel Dragons men's basketball seasons Drexel Drexel Dragons Men's Basketball Drexel Dragons Men's Basketball
title: 1934–35 Drexel Dragons men's basketball team
